title: Color Grading
description: The properties of the color grading

description.title: Color Grading Description
description.description: Contains non-component settings for the color grading settings.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for these color grading settings.

midtones.title: Midtones
midtones.description: Color grading parameters for midtones, and for when highlights or shadows are not specified.

contrast.title: Contrast
contrast.description: Describes the difference in luminance between the bright and dark pixels in an image, otherwise known as the tonal range.

gain.title: Gain
gain.description: A multiplication factor applied to each color channel to adjust the overall luminance intensity of the image.

gamma.title: Gamma
gamma.description: An exponential factor applied to the final color after both color grading and tone mapping to adjust the overall luminance intensity of the image.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: An additive factor that is multiplied by the average luminance of the scene and then added to a given color channel to adjust the overall luminance intensity of the image.

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.description: Determines the hue intensity of colors. A value of 1.0 results in no change in saturation to the original image.

highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.description: Optional color grading parameters for highlights.

highlightsMin.title: Highlights Min
highlightsMin.description: A factor multiplied by the average luminance of the scene to determine which pixels are considered highlights.

contrast.title: Contrast
contrast.description: Describes the difference in luminance between the bright and dark pixels in an image, otherwise known as the tonal range.

gain.title: Gain
gain.description: A multiplication factor applied to each color channel to adjust the overall luminance intensity of the image.

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.description: Determines the hue intensity of colors. A value of 1.0 results in no change in saturation to the original image.

shadows.title: Shadows
shadows.description: Optional color grading parameters for shadows.

shadowsMax.title: Shadows Min
shadowsMax.description: A factor multiplied by the average luminance of the scene to determine which pixels are considered shadows.

contrast.title: Contrast
contrast.description: Describes the difference in luminance between the bright and dark pixels in an image, otherwise known as the tonal range.

gain.title: Gain
gain.description: A multiplication factor applied to each color channel to adjust the overall luminance intensity of the image.

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.description: Determines the hue intensity of colors. A value of 1.0 results in no change in saturation to the original image.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Optional parameters for temperature based color grading.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of temperature color grading to apply

tone_mapping.title: Tone Mapping
tone_mapping.description: Tone mapping determines how a color is remapped from HDR-space to SDR-space for display on modern televisions and monitors.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: The operator for the tone mapping

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
